name: Punch Buggy
description:
A game inspired by a joke from an animated show. 

Rules are simple, spot a blue car, tag it by clicking on it - that will increase your score points. Once in a while you level up and game speeds up.

But be careful and avoid obstacles in your way as those penalize your progress and slows you down. On the other hand you can spot some bonuses along the way that can help you.

Controls
Use your mouse left button.
